description: An AWS Support App resource that creates, updates, lists, and deletes Slack workspace configurations.

TeamId.description: The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.
TeamId.markdownDescription:
The team ID in Slack, which uniquely identifies a workspace.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^\S+$  

Update requires: No interruption

VersionId.description: An identifier used to update an existing Slack workspace configuration in AWS CloudFormation.
VersionId.markdownDescription:
An identifier used to update an existing Slack workspace configuration in AWS CloudFormation.

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 256  

Pattern: ^[0-9]+$  

Update requires: No interruption
